title: Input schema for Apify ADA Scanner
description: Enter the start URL(s) website you want to scan.

useResidentialProxy.title: Use residential proxy
useResidentialProxy.description: Use residential proxy to avoid getting blocked by the target website

shouldEnqueueLinks.title: Should Enqueue Links
shouldEnqueueLinks.description: If true, the crawler will enqueue additional links discovered on the page. If false, it will scan only the provided start URLs.

ignoreKnown3pi.title: Ignore Known 3rd-party integrations
ignoreKnown3pi.description: remove known 3PI elements from the DOM before scanning
